projects.title: Portfolio
projects.summary: This project was just a way for me to train technologies that I’m currently learning and to show what I can do at my current level without any real goal in terms of client requirements or time limit (and also to have a bit of fun about the content and the look of the website). It allowed me to really explore and understand more of what I can do at the moment with Angular, and I’ll either update it frequently or create some brand new projects to challenge me even further throughout my learning journey !
